name: Rachael Bentz
coverLetter:
Hello, 
My name is Rachael Bentz. I am a freelance designer and illustrator living in the Portland area. I want to work in the cannabis industry because I am passionate about keeping weed legal and informing the public about its benefits. I have smoked cannabis for years and would be a beginner trimmer. But I am a hard worker and faster learner who loves a challenge. I have taken and passed the OLCC Recreational Marijuana worker permit test and am ready to being work in the cannabis industry.
Thank you for your time, consideration and have a great day.
